markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 39 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 [Mastiff Of Tindalos](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2343) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 416 **Perception** +29; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +31, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +27 **Str** +6 **Dex** +8 **Con** +4 **Int** +8 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +23 **Ref** +29 **Will** +27 **HP** 210 **Immunities** cold **Resistances** mental 15, poison 15, physical 15 **Otherworldly Mind** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Whenever a creature targets the hound with a mental effect, that creature takes 8d6 mental damage (DC 33 basic Will save). On a critical failure, it also becomes [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1d4 rounds.
**Ripping Gaze** ([aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [evocation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1671), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 30 feet. The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes 8d6 slashing damage (DC 33 basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
**Vulnerable to Curved Space** When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90ยบ (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) 1. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** jaws +29, **Damage** 3d12+14 **Melee** claws +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d10+14 **Occult Innate Spells** DC 32, attack +29 - **6th** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only), [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) - **7th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) - **8th** [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75) **Angled Entry** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) The hound of Tindalos casts a 7th-level [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90ยบ (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges.
Once per day, the hound can use this ability to plane shift to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to.
name: Mastiff Of Tindalos

On a critical failure, it also becomes confused for 1d4 rounds. Ripping Gaze (aura, evocation, occult, visual) 30 feet. The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes 8d6 slashing damage (DC 33 basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours. Vulnerable to Curved Space When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90ยบ (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes sickened 1. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle. --- Speed 30 feet, fly 30 feet Melee Single Action jaws +29, Damage 3d12+14 Melee Single Action claws +29 (Agile), Damage 3d10+14 Occult Innate Spells DC 32, attack +29 - 6th Invisibility (self only), Locate, Slow - 7th Dimension Door (at will), Dimensional Anchor, Haste - 8th Discern Location Angled Entry Free Action (Conjuration, Occult, Teleportation) The hound of Tindalos casts a 7th-level dimension door spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90ยบ (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges. Once per day, the hound can use this ability to plane shift to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to.
